parameters.name: BuyResourceIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the purchased IP instances. Separate multiple IDs with commas. Obtain these IDs from the response of the DedicatedIpNonePoolList operation.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the IP pool.

parameters.name: UpdateResource
parameters.description: Specifies whether to change the associated IP addresses. Set this parameter to true.
